bibl.title: Despatch from Daniel R. B. Upton, November 24, 1859
Despatches from U.S. Consuls in Bathurst, Gambia 1857-1889
bibl.publisher: National Archives and Records Service General Services Administration

div1.p: On the twenty fourth day of November 1859 before me the undersigned personally appeared Daniel R. B. Upton Esquire United States Consul at Bathurst and declared that the accounts annexed are a full & perfect transcript of the register which he is by law required to : that the same is true and correct and contains a full and accurate statement of all fees received by him as such Consular officer, or for his use, for his official services to the best of his knowledge, during the period of time therein mentioned.

Danl R. B. Upton
United States Consul

Declared to before me,
Rich Vine
Police Magistrate
